2022's Halloween Ends continues the return of Michael Myers from 2018's Halloween and 2021's Halloween Kills. They even used the Filmento idea all the way back from my video about first entry, in which Michael Myers shouldn't be only an old man in a mask but more of an idea that can spread and corrupt. Awesome! Unfortunately, that's not enough to save this movie, because it stumbles into a couple horror pitfalls which make it not scary. A horror movie where the horror doesn't work! In today's Anatomy of a Failure, let's see what those pitfalls are so that we can avoid them in our own horror scripts.

- Halloween Ends (2022) This is Laurie Strode‚Äôs last stand. After 45 years, the most acclaimed, revered horror franchise in film history reaches its epic, terrifying conclusion as Laurie Strode faces off for the last time against the embodiment of evil, Michael Myers, in a final confrontation unlike any captured on-screen before. Only one of them will survive. Icon Jamie Lee Curtis returns for the last time as Laurie Strode, horror‚Äôs first ‚Äúfinal girl‚Äù and the role that launched Curtis‚Äô career. Curtis has portrayed Laurie for more than four decades now, one of the longest actor-character pairings in cinema history. When the franchise relaunched in 2018, Halloween shattered box office records, becoming the franchise‚Äôs highest-grossing chapter and set a new record for the biggest opening weekend for a horror film starring a woman. Four years after the events of last year‚Äôs Halloween Kills, Laurie is living with her granddaughter Allyson (Andi Matichak) and is finishing writing her memoir. Laurie, after allowing the specter of Michael to determine and drive her reality for decades, has decided to liberate herself from fear and rage and embrace life. But when a young man, Corey Cunningham (Rohan Campbell; The Hardy Boys, Virgin River), is accused of killing a boy he was babysitting, it ignites a cascade of violence and terror that will force Laurie to finally confront the evil she can‚Äôt control, once and for all. - Halloween (2018) Director David Gordon Green‚Äôs slasher film is a direct sequel to the 1978 film of the same name. Four decades later, survivor Laurie Strode (Jamie Lee Curtis) braces herself for a final confrontation with serial killer Michael Myers (Nick Castle and James Jude Courtney) after he escapes from confinement while being transferred to a maximum-security prison.

entry.title: Why Rings of Power Failed where House of the Dragon Worked | One v One

Amazon's Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is here to dethrone Game of Thrones: House of the Dragon as the new biggest show on TV. But did it? The seasons are still ongoing I guess, but based on the pilot episode, House of the Dragon comes on top. Which is strange because both shows feature a lot of the fantasy elements. So in today's episode of One v One, let's compare these two shows with each other to see how the fantasy side of House of the Dragon is handled in such a way that it's much easier for casual audiences to get into the story... than compared to Rings of Power.

entry.title: Prey (Predator 2022) ‚Äî When Is a Movie Too Simple? | Anatomy Of A Failure

media:group.media:title: Prey (Predator 2022) ‚Äî When Is a Movie Too Simple? | Anatomy Of A Failure
media:group.media:description:
Get started with Brilliant for free at https://brilliant.org/FILMENTO -- the first 200 people also get 20% off the annual premium subscription.
2022's Prey is a new take on the Predator franchise, this time on streaming. It is a great example of what streaming movies should be: instead of putting 200 million dollar IP on streaming instead of theaters, make smaller movies with that IP you would never make for theaters and put that on streaming. One potential issue with the movie is that it could be too simple, to a point where it becomes almost too predictable. So in today's Anatomy of a Failure, let's see how to avoid making a movie that is too simple.

entry.title: Thor: Love and Thunder ‚Äî Why Marvel Villains Keep Flopping | Anatomy Of A Failure

media:group.media:title: Thor: Love and Thunder ‚Äî Why Marvel Villains Keep Flopping | Anatomy Of A Failure
media:group.media:description:

Thor: Love and Thunder reunites Thor with Natalie Portman's Jane Foster, who has now become a Thor as well, to take down the evil Gorr played by Christian Bale. Obviously this movie overall is yet another 10/10 as you can always expect from Marvel, but there is one negative aspect here as well: the villain. For some reason Gorr becomes another bland and forgettable MCU villain that you're gonna forget as soon as the movie ends, even despite Christian Bale. We already touched on this topic with Wanda in Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness, but let's look for a couple more reasons why Marvel villains suck and how to avoid those problems ourselves.

entry.title: Top Gun Maverick ‚Äî How to Make a Movie Without a Villain | Film Perfection

media:group.media:title: Top Gun Maverick ‚Äî How to Make a Movie Without a Villain | Film Perfection
media:group.media:description:
Step up your belt game with SlideBelts, use code FILMENTO for 20% off: https://slidebelts.com/
Filmento en Espa√±ol: https://youtu.be/ViDZUofaZd8
Top Gun Maverick brings back Tom Cruise as Maverick to once more fly fighter jets in a visual marvel. The movie became the biggest box office success of the year, even more so than the MCU, and everybody seemed to like it. Which is crazy because this movie is missing a proper villain. Somehow it just manages to make things work without one. So in today's Film Perfection let's try to figure out what you can do when the villain is missing. Not to say you shouldn't include a villain, because unless you're Christopher McQuarrie it might go badly wrong, but more so what you can do on top of your villain.

entry.title: Jurassic World Dominion ‚Äî How a Movie Ruined Itself | Anatomy Of A Failure

media:group.media:description:
Sponsored by Ridge Wallet. Get 10% off and free international shipping with code FILMENTO: https://ridge.com/FILMENTO
Jurassic World Dominion is the latest entry in the Jurassic Park reboot franchise, which has some good stuff in it and made a bunch of money as per usual. But despite all the positives, the movie also harms itself with a second, very unentertaining plotline in addition to the Chris Pratt one that ultimately drags the entire experience down to the swamps. And so in today's Anatomy of a Failure, let's compare the two main plotlines of the movie to see why one of them doesn't work at all. Here's when you should cut your losses and focus on what actually works in your movie.

Chris Pratt and Bryce Dallas Howard are joined by Oscar¬Æ-winner Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum and Sam Neill in Jurassic World Dominion, a bold, timely and breathtaking new adventure that spans the globe. From Jurassic World architect and director Colin Trevorrow, Dominion takes place four years after Isla Nublar has been destroyed. Dinosaurs now live‚Äîand hunt‚Äîalongside humans all over the world. entry.title: Ninja Turtles ‚Äî How to Fail at Launching a Franchise | Anatomy Of A Failure

media:group.media:description:

2014's Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles was an effort from Paramount and Michael Bay to recapture the financial success of the Transformers franchise. Unfortunately it didn't exactly go as planned. The movie was pretty bad and forgettable to the point where the better sequel flopped at the box office badly and thus the franchise was buried before it even fully began. In today's Anatomy of a Failure, lets look at TMNT to see the pitfalls of starting a new blockbuster franchise.

entry.title: Ambulance (2022) ‚Äî What is Bayhem? | Film Perfection

media:group.media:description:

Ambulance is a new 2022 action movie from Filmento's biggest enemy/friend Michael Bay. A lot of negativity has been said about his Transformers movies here, but Ambulance is a return to form for him as well as a great showcase of his biggest strength: Bayhem. And that's not just explosions -- there is something about Michael Bay that allows him to pack his movies with incredible action if he only cares enough to try. And so today let's dive into what Bayhem means and how to use it in our own action scripts.

A charismatic career criminal, Danny instead offers him a score: the biggest bank heist in Los Angeles history: $32 million. With his wife‚Äôs survival on the line, Will can‚Äôt say no. But when their getaway goes spectacularly wrong, the desperate brothers hijack an ambulance with a wounded cop clinging to life and ace EMT Cam Thompson (Eiza Gonz√°lez, Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw) onboard. entry.title: The Secrets of Dumbledore ‚Äî Death by Author | Anatomy Of A Failure

media:group.media:title: The Secrets of Dumbledore ‚Äî Death by Author | Anatomy Of A Failure
media:group.media:description:
Get 20% off your first Bespoke Post box at https://bespokepost.com/filmento by using code FILMENTO at checkout. Thanks to Bespoke Post for sponsoring the video.
Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore is another not-Harry Potter movie from Warner Brothers that is much like its predecessor The Crimes of Grindelwald: amazing to look at but boring to watch because of bad writing. And as before, most of the narrative faults come from JK Rowling doing the writing despite not being a screenwriter. She has had success with books but she keeps doing book things that do not work on screen. We talked about this in the last video "Crimes of Grindewald ‚Äî Death by Author" but let's do it more. Here are a few more dangers to avoid when writing a film as a book author.
Support: https://patreon.com/filmento Follow: https://twitter.com/filmento
Music: https://youtu.be/m0o5OwN4ab0
#FantasticBeasts #AnatomyOfAFailure #SecretsOfDumbledore

Morbius is a new sort-of MCU superhero origin movie from Sony, in which Doctor Michael Morbius played by Jared Leto transforms into Morbius. The movie did break all kinds of box office records and sold over 300 morbillion tickets, but the reception wasn't so great. The entire internet was mostly making fun of and memeing Morbius. So in today's Anatomy of a Failure, let's see what Morbius did and didn't do in order to become an easy target online. Let's see why Morbius is a bad movie and how it can avoid the same fate in the sequel.

entry.title: Sonic 2 ‚Äî How to Break the Video Game Movie Curse | Film Perfection

media:group.media:title: Sonic 2 ‚Äî How to Break the Video Game Movie Curse | Film Perfection
media:group.media:description:
Thanks to Established Titles for sponsoring this video! Use code Filmento to get 10% off on top of their big Memorial Day sale: https://establishedtitles.com/Filmento
2022's Sonic the Hedgehog 2 continues the story of 2020's surprise hit Sonic the Hedgehog. There's a lot to like in the sequel, from in-form Jim Carrey to new characters like Knuckles and Tails. But just like in the first movie, the most amazing thing about Sonic 2 is how it manages to feel like a proper movie despite being based on a video game. Just last week we talked about how Uncharted was affected by the video game movie stigma, and yet Sonic 2 passes all those problems easily. So in today's Film Perfection, let's see how the movie did it. Building on my video on the first Sonic movie, here's a few more ways to break the video game movie curse.
Support: https://patreon.com/filmento Follow: https://twitter.com/filmento
Music: https://youtu.be/5DwS72t1ky8 https://youtu.be/TT_b3YU8SRk https://www.youtube.com/c/WhiteBatAudio
#Sonic2 #SonicTheHedgehog2 #FilmPerfection
- Sonic the Hedgehog 2 (2022) The world‚Äôs favorite blue hedgehog is back for a next-level adventure in SONIC THE HEDGEHOG 2. After settling in Green Hills, Sonic is eager to prove he has what it takes to be a true hero. His test comes when Dr. Robotnik returns, this time with a new partner, Knuckles, in search for an emerald that has the power to destroy civilizations. Sonic teams up with his own sidekick, Tails, and together they embark on a globe-trotting journey to find the emerald before it falls into the wrong hands. From the filmmakers behind The Fast and the Furious and Deadpool, SONIC THE HEDGEHOG 2 stars James Marsden, Ben Schwartz as the voice of Sonic, Tika Sumpter, Natasha Rothwell, Adam Pally, and Jim Carrey returning, alongside new additions Shemar Moore, with Idris Elba as the voice of Knuckles, and Colleen O'Shaughnessey as the voice of Tails. - Assassin's Creed (2016) In this feature-film adaptation of the hugely popular video-game series, death-row convict Callum Lynch (Michael Fassbender) relives his ancestor's memories as an assassin in 15th century Spain. From this out-of-body experience, Lynch gains the training he needs to battle a conspiracy in the present day. entry.title: Uncharted ‚Äî How to be Ruined by the Video Game Movie Curse | Anatomy Of A Failure

2022's Uncharted is a film adaptation of Playstation's Uncharted video game franchise, with Tom Holland as Nathan Drake and Mark Wahlberg as Mark Wahlberg. And as much as I liked it personally, it is yet another victim of the infamous video game movie curse that also claimed other victims like Mortal Kombat and Tomb Raider. So like in the Moral Kombat video, lets see how being a video game movie has harmful effects on Uncharted and how to hopefully fix them for the future. As weird as it may seem... Sonic the Hedgehog might still be the best video game movie to date. I just hope they get Bioshock right, but then again it's Netflix so I dunno.
Support: https://patreon.com/filmento Follow: https://twitter.com/filmento
Music: #Uncharted #AnatomyOfAFailure
- Uncharted (2022) Intrepid twentysomething Nathan Drake (Tom Holland) desires a life of adventure. Upon crossing paths with the wry Victor Sullivan (Mark Wahlberg), the adventurous duo embarks on a high-stakes international quest to find the world's most elusive ancient treasure. Along the way, they encounter evidence that may lead to the whereabouts of Drake's estranged brother. Ruben Fleischer directs the prequel to the computer game of the same name. Co-starring Antonio Banderas and Tati Gabrielle. - Mortal Kombat (2021) MMA fighter Cole Young (Lewis Tan) is unaware of his heritage - or why Outworld‚Äôs Emperor seeks to hunt him down. Cole finds sanctuary under Lord Raiden (Tadanobu Asano) and prepares to stand with Earth‚Äôs greatest champions against the enemies of Outworld in a high-stakes battle for the universe. Will Cole be able to unleash his arcana in time to stop the Outworld once and for all? Mortal Kombat is in theaters April 23 and streaming exclusively on HBO Max at 12:01 am PT/3:01 am ET. Available on HBO Max in the US only at no extra cost to subscribers for 31 days from its theatrical release.
